qas.question: When was the Freddie Mercury Tribute Concert held?
Where was the Freddie Mercury Tribute Concert held?
How many people attended the Freddie Mercury Tribute Concert?
Which band was he largest benefit concert in history about?
How many viewers did the largest rock star benefit concert attract?

context: On <a0_0>20 April 1992<a0_0/>, The Freddie Mercury Tribute Concert was held at <a1_0>London's Wembley Stadium<a1_0/> to a <a2_0>72,000<a2_0/>-strong crowd. Performers, including Def Leppard, Robert Plant, Guns N' Roses, Elton John, David Bowie, George Michael, Annie Lennox, Seal, Extreme, and Metallica performed various Queen songs along with the three remaining <a3_0>Queen<a3_0/> members (and Spike Edney.) The concert is listed in the Guinness Book of Records as "The largest rock star benefit concert", as it was televised to over <a4_0>1.2 billion viewers worldwide<a4_0/>, and raised over £20,000,000 for AIDS charities.
